al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī anzala ʿalā ʿabdihi al-kitāba walam yajʿal lahu ʿiwajā
qayyiman liyundhira basan shadīdan min ladun'hu wayubashira al-mu'minīna alladhīna yaʿmalūna al-ṣāliḥāti anna lahum ajran ḥasanan
mākithīna fīhi abadan
wayundhira alladhīna qālū ittakhadha al-lahu waladan
mā lahum bihi min ʿil'min walā liābāihim kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwāhihim in yaqūlūna illā kadhiban
falaʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka ʿalā āthārihim in lam yu'minū bihādhā al-ḥadīthi asafan
innā jaʿalnā mā ʿalā al-arḍi zīnatan lahā linabluwahum ayyuhum aḥsanu ʿamalan
wa-innā lajāʿilūna mā ʿalayhā ṣaʿīdan juruzan
am ḥasib'ta anna aṣḥāba al-kahfi wal-raqīmi kānū min āyātinā ʿajaban
idh awā al-fit'yatu ilā al-kahfi faqālū rabbanā ātinā min ladunka raḥmatan wahayyi lanā min amrinā rashadan
faḍarabnā ʿalā ādhānihim fī al-kahfi sinīna ʿadadan
thumma baʿathnāhum linaʿlama ayyu al-ḥiz'bayni aḥṣā limā labithū amadan
naḥnu naquṣṣu ʿalayka naba-ahum bil-ḥaqi innahum fit'yatun āmanū birabbihim wazid'nāhum hudan
warabaṭnā ʿalā qulūbihim idh qāmū faqālū rabbunā rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi lan nadʿuwā min dūnihi ilāhan laqad qul'nā idhan shaṭaṭan
hāulāi qawmunā ittakhadhū min dūnihi ālihatan lawlā yatūna ʿalayhim bisul'ṭānin bayyinin faman aẓlamu mimmani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban
wa-idhi iʿ'tazaltumūhum wamā yaʿbudūna illā al-laha fawū ilā al-kahfi yanshur lakum rabbukum min raḥmatihi wayuhayyi lakum min amrikum mir'faqan

watarā al-shamsa idhā ṭalaʿat tazāwaru ʿan kahfihim dhāta al-yamīni wa-idhā gharabat taqriḍuhum dhāta al-shimāli wahum fī fajwatin min'hu dhālika min āyāti al-lahi man yahdi al-lahu fahuwa al-muh'tadi waman yuḍ'lil falan tajida lahu waliyyan mur'shidan

wataḥsabuhum ayqāẓan wahum ruqūdun wanuqallibuhum dhāta al-yamīni wadhāta al-shimāli wakalbuhum bāsiṭun dhirāʿayhi bil-waṣīdi lawi iṭṭalaʿta ʿalayhim lawallayta min'hum firāran walamuli'ta min'hum ruʿ'ban

wakadhālika baʿathnāhum liyatasāalū baynahum qāla qāilun min'hum kam labith'tum qālū labith'nā yawman aw baʿḍa yawmin qālū rabbukum aʿlamu bimā labith'tum fa-ib'ʿathū aḥadakum biwariqikum hādhihi ilā al-madīnati falyanẓur ayyuhā azkā ṭaʿāman falyatikum biriz'qin min'hu walyatalaṭṭaf walā yush'ʿiranna bikum aḥadan
innahum in yaẓharū ʿalaykum yarjumūkum aw yuʿīdūkum fī millatihim walan tuf'liḥū idhan abadan

wakadhālika aʿtharnā ʿalayhim liyaʿlamū anna waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqun wa-anna al-sāʿata lā rayba fīhā idh yatanāzaʿūna baynahum amrahum faqālū ib'nū ʿalayhim bun'yānan rabbuhum aʿlamu bihim qāla alladhīna ghalabū ʿalā amrihim lanattakhidhanna ʿalayhim masjidan

sayaqūlūna thalāthatun rābiʿuhum kalbuhum wayaqūlūna khamsatun sādisuhum kalbuhum rajman bil-ghaybi wayaqūlūna sabʿatun wathāminuhum kalbuhum qul rabbī aʿlamu biʿiddatihim mā yaʿlamuhum illā qalīlun falā tumāri fīhim illā mirāan ẓāhiran walā tastafti fīhim min'hum aḥadan
walā taqūlanna lishāy'in innī fāʿilun dhālika ghadan
illā an yashāa al-lahu wa-udh'kur rabbaka idhā nasīta waqul ʿasā an yahdiyani rabbī li-aqraba min hādhā rashadan
walabithū fī kahfihim thalātha mi-atin sinīna wa-iz'dādū tis'ʿan
quli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā labithū lahu ghaybu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi abṣir bihi wa-asmiʿ mā lahum min dūnihi min waliyyin walā yush'riku fī ḥuk'mihi aḥadan
wa-ut'lu mā ūḥiya ilayka min kitābi rabbika lā mubaddila likalimātihi walan tajida min dūnihi mul'taḥadan

wa-iṣ'bir nafsaka maʿa alladhīna yadʿūna rabbahum bil-ghadati wal-ʿashiyi yurīdūna wajhahu walā taʿdu ʿaynāka ʿanhum turīdu zīnata al-ḥayati al-dun'yā walā tuṭiʿ man aghfalnā qalbahu ʿan dhik'rinā wa-ittabaʿa hawāhu wakāna amruhu furuṭan

waquli al-ḥaqu min rabbikum faman shāa falyu'min waman shāa falyakfur innā aʿtadnā lilẓẓālimīna nāran aḥāṭa bihim surādiquhā wa-in yastaghīthū yughāthū bimāin kal-muh'li yashwī al-wujūha bi'sa al-sharābu wasāat mur'tafaqan
inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti innā lā nuḍīʿu ajra man aḥsana ʿamalan

ulāika lahum jannātu ʿadnin tajrī min taḥtihimu al-anhāru yuḥallawna fīhā min asāwira min dhahabin wayalbasūna thiyāban khuḍ'ran min sundusin wa-is'tabraqin muttakiīna fīhā ʿalā al-arāiki niʿ'ma al-thawābu waḥasunat mur'tafaqan
wa-iḍ'rib lahum mathalan rajulayni jaʿalnā li-aḥadihimā jannatayni min aʿnābin waḥafafnāhumā binakhlin wajaʿalnā baynahumā zarʿan
kil'tā al-janatayni ātat ukulahā walam taẓlim min'hu shayan wafajjarnā khilālahumā naharan
wakāna lahu thamarun faqāla liṣāḥibihi wahuwa yuḥāwiruhu anā aktharu minka mālan wa-aʿazzu nafaran
wadakhala jannatahu wahuwa ẓālimun linafsihi qāla mā aẓunnu an tabīda hādhihi abadan
wamā aẓunnu al-sāʿata qāimatan wala-in rudidttu ilā rabbī la-ajidanna khayran min'hā munqalaban
qāla lahu ṣāḥibuhu wahuwa yuḥāwiruhu akafarta bi-alladhī khalaqaka min turābin thumma min nuṭ'fatin thumma sawwāka rajulan
lākinnā huwa al-lahu rabbī walā ush'riku birabbī aḥadan
walawlā idh dakhalta jannataka qul'ta mā shāa al-lahu lā quwwata illā bil-lahi in tarani anā aqalla minka mālan wawaladan
faʿasā rabbī an yu'tiyani khayran min jannatika wayur'sila ʿalayhā ḥus'bānan mina al-samāi fatuṣ'biḥa ṣaʿīdan zalaqan
aw yuṣ'biḥa māuhā ghawran falan tastaṭīʿa lahu ṭalaban
wa-uḥīṭa bithamarihi fa-aṣbaḥa yuqallibu kaffayhi ʿalā mā anfaqa fīhā wahiya khāwiyatun ʿalā ʿurūshihā wayaqūlu yālaytanī lam ush'rik birabbī aḥadan
walam takun lahu fi-atun yanṣurūnahu min dūni al-lahi wamā kāna muntaṣiran
hunālika al-walāyatu lillahi al-ḥaqi huwa khayrun thawāban wakhayrun ʿuq'ban
wa-iḍ'rib lahum mathala al-ḥayati al-dun'yā kamāin anzalnāhu mina al-samāi fa-ikh'talaṭa bihi nabātu al-arḍi fa-aṣbaḥa hashīman tadhrūhu al-riyāḥu wakāna al-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin muq'tadiran
al-mālu wal-banūna zīnatu al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wal-bāqiyātu al-ṣāliḥātu khayrun ʿinda rabbika thawāban wakhayrun amalan
wayawma nusayyiru al-jibāla watarā al-arḍa bārizatan waḥasharnāhum falam nughādir min'hum aḥadan
waʿuriḍū ʿalā rabbika ṣaffan laqad ji'tumūnā kamā khalaqnākum awwala marratin bal zaʿamtum allan najʿala lakum mawʿidan

wawuḍiʿa al-kitābu fatarā al-muj'rimīna mush'fiqīna mimmā fīhi wayaqūlūna yāwaylatanā māli hādhā al-kitābi lā yughādiru ṣaghīratan walā kabīratan illā aḥṣāhā wawajadū mā ʿamilū ḥāḍiran walā yaẓlimu rabbuka aḥadan

wa-idh qul'nā lil'malāikati us'judū liādama fasajadū illā ib'līsa kāna mina al-jini fafasaqa ʿan amri rabbihi afatattakhidhūnahu wadhurriyyatahu awliyāa min dūnī wahum lakum ʿaduwwun bi'sa lilẓẓālimīna badalan
mā ashhadttuhum khalqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walā khalqa anfusihim wamā kuntu muttakhidha al-muḍilīna ʿaḍudan
wayawma yaqūlu nādū shurakāiya alladhīna zaʿamtum fadaʿawhum falam yastajībū lahum wajaʿalnā baynahum mawbiqan
waraā al-muj'rimūna al-nāra faẓannū annahum muwāqiʿūhā walam yajidū ʿanhā maṣrifan
walaqad ṣarrafnā fī hādhā al-qur'āni lilnnāsi min kulli mathalin wakāna al-insānu akthara shayin jadalan
wamā manaʿa al-nāsa an yu'minū idh jāahumu al-hudā wayastaghfirū rabbahum illā an tatiyahum sunnatu al-awalīna aw yatiyahumu al-ʿadhābu qubulan
wamā nur'silu al-mur'salīna illā mubashirīna wamundhirīna wayujādilu alladhīna kafarū bil-bāṭili liyud'ḥiḍū bihi al-ḥaqa wa-ittakhadhū āyātī wamā undhirū huzuwan

waman aẓlamu mimman dhukkira biāyāti rabbihi fa-aʿraḍa ʿanhā wanasiya mā qaddamat yadāhu innā jaʿalnā ʿalā qulūbihim akinnatan an yafqahūhu wafī ādhānihim waqran wa-in tadʿuhum ilā al-hudā falan yahtadū idhan abadan
warabbuka al-ghafūru dhū al-raḥmati law yuākhidhuhum bimā kasabū laʿajjala lahumu al-ʿadhāba bal lahum mawʿidun lan yajidū min dūnihi mawilan
watil'ka al-qurā ahlaknāhum lammā ẓalamū wajaʿalnā limahlikihim mawʿidan
wa-idh qāla mūsā lifatāhu lā abraḥu ḥattā ablugha majmaʿa al-baḥrayni aw amḍiya ḥuquban
falammā balaghā majmaʿa baynihimā nasiyā ḥūtahumā fa-ittakhadha sabīlahu fī al-baḥri saraban
falammā jāwazā qāla lifatāhu ātinā ghadāanā laqad laqīnā min safarinā hādhā naṣaban
qāla ara-ayta idh awaynā ilā al-ṣakhrati fa-innī nasītu al-ḥūta wamā ansānīhu illā al-shayṭānu an adhkurahu wa-ittakhadha sabīlahu fī al-baḥri ʿajaban
qāla dhālika mā kunnā nabghi fa-ir'taddā ʿalā āthārihimā qaṣaṣan
fawajadā ʿabdan min ʿibādinā ātaynāhu raḥmatan min ʿindinā waʿallamnāhu min ladunnā ʿil'man
qāla lahu mūsā hal attabiʿuka ʿalā an tuʿallimani mimmā ʿullim'ta rush'dan
qāla innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
wakayfa taṣbiru ʿalā mā lam tuḥiṭ bihi khub'ran
qāla satajidunī in shāa al-lahu ṣābiran walā aʿṣī laka amran
qāla fa-ini ittabaʿtanī falā tasalnī ʿan shayin ḥattā uḥ'ditha laka min'hu dhik'ran
fa-inṭalaqā ḥattā idhā rakibā fī al-safīnati kharaqahā qāla akharaqtahā litugh'riqa ahlahā laqad ji'ta shayan im'ran
qāla alam aqul innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
qāla lā tuākhidh'nī bimā nasītu walā tur'hiq'nī min amrī ʿus'ran
fa-inṭalaqā ḥattā idhā laqiyā ghulāman faqatalahu qāla aqatalta nafsan zakiyyatan bighayri nafsin laqad ji'ta shayan nuk'ran
qāla alam aqul laka innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
qāla in sa-altuka ʿan shayin baʿdahā falā tuṣāḥib'nī qad balaghta min ladunnī ʿudh'ran
fa-inṭalaqā ḥattā idhā atayā ahla qaryatin is'taṭʿamā ahlahā fa-abaw an yuḍayyifūhumā fawajadā fīhā jidāran yurīdu an yanqaḍḍa fa-aqāmahu qāla law shi'ta lattakhadhta ʿalayhi ajran
qāla hādhā firāqu baynī wabaynika sa-unabbi-uka bitawīli mā lam tastaṭiʿ ʿalayhi ṣabran
ammā al-safīnatu fakānat limasākīna yaʿmalūna fī al-baḥri fa-aradttu an aʿībahā wakāna warāahum malikun yakhudhu kulla safīnatin ghaṣban
wa-ammā al-ghulāmu fakāna abawāhu mu'minayni fakhashīnā an yur'hiqahumā ṭugh'yānan wakuf'ran
fa-aradnā an yub'dilahumā rabbuhumā khayran min'hu zakatan wa-aqraba ruḥ'man

wa-ammā al-jidāru fakāna lighulāmayni yatīmayni fī al-madīnati wakāna taḥtahu kanzun lahumā wakāna abūhumā ṣāliḥan fa-arāda rabbuka an yablughā ashuddahumā wayastakhrijā kanzahumā raḥmatan min rabbika wamā faʿaltuhu ʿan amrī dhālika tawīlu mā lam tasṭiʿ ʿalayhi ṣabran
wayasalūnaka ʿan dhī al-qarnayni qul sa-atlū ʿalaykum min'hu dhik'ran
innā makkannā lahu fī al-arḍi waātaynāhu min kulli shayin sababan
fa-atbaʿa sababan
ḥattā idhā balagha maghriba al-shamsi wajadahā taghrubu fī ʿaynin ḥami-atin wawajada ʿindahā qawman qul'nā yādhā al-qarnayni immā an tuʿadhiba wa-immā an tattakhidha fīhim ḥus'nan
qāla ammā man ẓalama fasawfa nuʿadhibuhu thumma yuraddu ilā rabbihi fayuʿadhibuhu ʿadhāban nuk'ran
wa-ammā man āmana waʿamila ṣāliḥan falahu jazāan al-ḥus'nā wasanaqūlu lahu min amrinā yus'ran
thumma atbaʿa sababan
ḥattā idhā balagha maṭliʿa al-shamsi wajadahā taṭluʿu ʿalā qawmin lam najʿal lahum min dūnihā sit'ran
kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
thumma atbaʿa sababan
ḥattā idhā balagha bayna al-sadayni wajada min dūnihimā qawman lā yakādūna yafqahūna qawlan
qālū yādhā al-qarnayni inna yajūja wamajūja muf'sidūna fī al-arḍi fahal najʿalu laka kharjan ʿalā an tajʿala baynanā wabaynahum saddan
qāla mā makkannī fīhi rabbī khayrun fa-aʿīnūnī biquwwatin ajʿal baynakum wabaynahum radman
ātūnī zubara al-ḥadīdi ḥattā idhā sāwā bayna al-ṣadafayni qāla unfukhū ḥattā idhā jaʿalahu nāran qāla ātūnī uf'righ ʿalayhi qiṭ'ran
famā is'ṭāʿū an yaẓharūhu wamā is'taṭāʿū lahu naqban
qāla hādhā raḥmatun min rabbī fa-idhā jāa waʿdu rabbī jaʿalahu dakkāa wakāna waʿdu rabbī ḥaqqan
wataraknā baʿḍahum yawma-idhin yamūju fī baʿḍin wanufikha fī al-ṣūri fajamaʿnāhum jamʿan
waʿaraḍnā jahannama yawma-idhin lil'kāfirīna ʿarḍan
alladhīna kānat aʿyunuhum fī ghiṭāin ʿan dhik'rī wakānū lā yastaṭīʿūna samʿan
afaḥasiba alladhīna kafarū an yattakhidhū ʿibādī min dūnī awliyāa innā aʿtadnā jahannama lil'kāfirīna nuzulan
qul hal nunabbi-ukum bil-akhsarīna aʿmālan
alladhīna ḍalla saʿyuhum fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wahum yaḥsabūna annahum yuḥ'sinūna ṣun'ʿan
ulāika alladhīna kafarū biāyāti rabbihim waliqāihi faḥabiṭat aʿmāluhum falā nuqīmu lahum yawma al-qiyāmati waznan
dhālika jazāuhum jahannamu bimā kafarū wa-ittakhadhū āyātī warusulī huzuwan
inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti kānat lahum jannātu al-fir'dawsi nuzulan
khālidīna fīhā lā yabghūna ʿanhā ḥiwalan
qul law kāna al-baḥru midādan likalimāti rabbī lanafida al-baḥru qabla an tanfada kalimātu rabbī walaw ji'nā bimith'lihi madadan
qul innamā anā basharun mith'lukum yūḥā ilayya annamā ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥidun faman kāna yarjū liqāa rabbihi falyaʿmal ʿamalan ṣāliḥan walā yush'rik biʿibādati rabbihi aḥadan
